Name: Bridgetown Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Rum-laced sweet and sourness with maraschino liqueur brilliantly balancing grapefruit juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Bridgetown Daiquiri contains 187 calories
